newsitem.title: USA: SunRiver Corp unit details new product. [CORRECTED 22:14 GMT]
newsitem.headline: SunRiver Corp unit details new product. [CORRECTED 22:14 GMT]

text.p: SunRiver Data Systems, subsidiary of SunRiver Corp, outlined its newly-introduced network computer line on Monday.

Boundless Technologies Network Computer line provides end-users with similar capabilities as those of a LAN-based personal computer (PC), including multi-media support and on-demand access to data applications.
The flagship XL model allows the broadcast multi-user access to any network computer currently available. Other models are low-cost network computers.
The computers are priced at about $649 each, with the actual cost varying depending upon the specific model and configuration selected.
In an earlier release SunRiver Corp (corrects company name from SunRise Corp) and its fully-owned subsidiary announced a name change to reflect the introduction of the new line of network computers.
